summary: DragonHide Robes from hothtrooper44 has been tweaked for mages.
descriptionHtml:
First of all a big thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3656551/?]hothtrooper44[/url], the original author of the amazing [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18296/?]Dragonhide Robes[/url] armor mod, for giving me authorization to make this.


[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]

What this mod does:

-removed heavy and leather variation of Dragonhide robes from the original mod,
-cloth version can be crafted without any perk at tanning rack.
-powerful enchanted and very expensive version can be bought from Farengar Secret-Fire.

The reason for this mod is to give a "target" set for cloth mages. It can be considered an end-game mage set.
Here's the stats on enchanted version:

Enchanted Dragonhide Robe: +200% magicka regen, +75 magicka
Enchanted Dragonhide Gauntlets: +75% magicka regen
Enchanted Dragonhide Hood/Crowned Hood: 5% reduction on all spells cast
Enchanted Dragonhide Boots: +15% magic resistance.

Gauntlets can be disenchanted, but Hood, Cuirass and Boots cannot since i don't want to add new enchants to vanilla.

Feel free to suggest enchant tweaks if they are too much powerful or too much weak.


[color=yellow][b]Installation:[/b][/color]

Download hothtrooper44 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18296/?]Original mod[/url] and copy only Meshes and textures in Data.
Then download DragonHide Robes for Mages and copy one .esp.

An italian version is available inside the main file.
